chinese: 于以采蘩、于沼于沚。于以用之、公侯之事。
english: She gathers the white southernwood,By the ponds, on the islets.She employs it,In the business of our prince.

chinese: 于以采蘩、于㵎之中。于以用之、公侯之宮。
english: She gathers the white southernwood,Along the streams in the valleys.She employs it,In the temple of our prince.

chinese: 被之僮僮、夙夜在公。被之祁祁、薄言還歸。
english: With head-dress reverently rising aloft,Early, while yet it is night, she is in the prince's temple;In her dead-dress, slowly retiring,She returns to her own apartments.
